item.title: CVE-2024-37954|2024-08-02T04:04:24.349Z -- marcelotorres -- simple%20responsive%20slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in marcelotorres Simple Responsive Slider allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Simple Responsive Slider: from n/a through 0.2.2.5.
